name: Drifting Lada Edition - Retro Car Drift and Race
name_original: Drifting Lada Edition - Retro Car Drift and Race
description:
Build your own LADA and experience the most realistic handling on a drift track!

Have you ever wanted to build your own Lada? Now here is your chance to customize your 2107, 2101 or Niva and take it out on the track for some drifting.

BODY PARTS
-Custom front and rear bumpers
-Spoilers
-Exhausts
-multiple rims to select from and more to come.

PERFORMANCE UPGRADES
(Each Upgrade has 3 stages)
-Suspension upgrade (lower ride height)
-Body weight (decrease the cars weight and automatically equip Racing Seats and Roll Cage)
-Engine tuning

PAINTJOBS
-18 different colors for both the car and the rims (more colors are coming soon)

You earn money by drifting on a drift track and you can spend it on body parts, upgrades or paint jobs.
This game truly has the most realistic handling, and controlling the car is both fun and challenging, but if you've played realistic games before, this would be no challenge for you!
